Act as an Anti-cancer Agent. cremini mushrooms is conjugated linoleic acid (CLA), which has been shown to have protective effects against growth of cancerous cells.

Including cremini mushrooms in your diet may help reduce the risk of breast cancer considerably. As we all know, the hormone estrogen, predominantly found in women, is known to stimulate proliferation of breast cancer cells. CLA's ability to inhibit circulation of estrogen may provide protection against breast cancer.
